name: LEGO Bricks
prompt: A VibeDeck controller built entirely from colorful LEGO bricks. Red, blue, yellow, green LEGO pieces snapped together to form the body. The rotary knob is a large round LEGO piece. Buttons are 2x2 LEGO studs in different colors. The LCD screen is a printed LEGO tile. Playful, nostalgic, toy-like. You can see the LEGO studs and connection points. Bright cheerful lighting.
